website_summaries.verdict: Great support, great value, and great color. But be forewarned: they look a little big on the feet.
pros: Ideal for long day hikes and short backpacking trips over rough terrain
Ideal for long day hikes and short backpacking trips over rough terrain
GORE-TEX Extended Comfort Footwear technology delivers breathable, waterproof protection
Cut high at the ankle for increased ankle support and stability
Gusseted tongue helps keep debris out
Protective mud guard around the base
Advanced Chassis, placed between the midsole and outsole, optimizes motion control, energy management, stability, and cushioning
Non-marking CONTAGRIP outsole delivers optimal traction over varied terrain
cons: Fit runs true to size, but they look disproportionately large

customer_reviews.title: Ladies, Take Heed... Runs large...
customer_reviews.text: I own 3 pairs of Salomon in 9 1/2. All fit me perfectly. This boot however is much wider, deeper, and longer. I generally wear a 9 1/2B, I feel swallowed up by these. If you are concientous(sp) about having your feet look too large for your body, then consider another style. The rubber on the front of the toe cap, looks like it curves up and is chunky looking. I looked in the mirror and thought "I'm looking at a clown's shoe".
customer_reviews.author: CriticalReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product at an excellent price. My fiance Works at a farm and on her feet all day we have tried many pairs of boots for her to wear and this is the first pair that are comfortable and waterproof. I would recommend these to anyone for hiking or for long days on you feet that require a type of boot that is breathable and waterproof..
customer_reviews.author: Allen Henry

customer_reviews.title: By far my favorite hiking shoes
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite hiking shoes. Have worn them for several hikes but the best was the 48 hour back packing excursion in the grand canyon. 45 miles in 48 hours and not a single blister with this babies.
customer_reviews.author: Karisa Hager

customer_reviews.title: The waterproofing worked well until I fell in the creek lol.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 10 so I purchased a 10 1/2 to allow room for my wool socks and sock liners. They were too big. Fortunately, I added a pair orthotics and they were a perfit fit.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Best Boots EVER!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Felt so good, come already broken in. They felt soooo good, I purchased a second pair. (In a different color of course) The price is not bad either...
customer_reviews.author: Grannie G

customer_reviews.title: Excellence
customer_reviews.text: I will only ever buy this brand of boots for hiking. I wear them literally every day in all kinds of weather. This is the 3rd pair I've had from the brand, and each pair has lasted at least a year and a half. Sturdy and waterproof. On a side note, these were delivered much faster than I expected. So, feeling very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Stoner

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! Walked all day and my feet did not get tired! Recommended to all!
customer_reviews.author: jb8284

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value! These held up extremely well to months of daily use while trekking with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: frustrated

customer_reviews.title: Wide toe box but very long for a size 6.5.
customer_reviews.text: Bummed that these did not fit. The toe box had plenty of room for my wide feet but the shoes were very long for a 6.5 and the heels slipped.
customer_reviews.author: S.L.

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. Comfortable, durable, waterproof when hiking across shallow creeks. They don't rub blisters and can be laced to fit even my long, narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight hiking boot
customer_reviews.text: Love these hiking boots! Was worried that I would have some break in time but ended up walking on a 2-hour hike the first day I wore them and they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic boot. Climbed Diamondhead and Salomon lived up to all myt expectations!!
customer_reviews.author: Hulkstr8

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice waterproof lighter weight hiking shoe. Fits perfect at my normal size without sizing up.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely the best fitting hiking boots I've ever found! I LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Mintle

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but left me with sore joints.
customer_reviews.text: These DO run large about 1/2 size so plan accordingly. The shoe itself is light, well-built. Only doing 3 stars because after wearing them (and I tried this multiple times with the same result), my hip and knee on my left leg were really sore. Put on my other boots and went away so I know it the boot and something in the structure.
customer_reviews.author: ReverenceAcres

customer_reviews.title: Fits large
customer_reviews.text: Runs large so be careful with sizing! A good shoe otherwise and price is reasonable also. Comfy shoe to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hiked over 100 miles in 10 days in these and they kept my feet dry and blister free.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a dream. Absolutely what I wanted. Heavier than normal shoes but that is expected. Very comfortable and supportive especially around the ankles. I can't wait to test these out on the trail.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

product_meta.title: Salomon Women's Authentic LTR GTX W Backpacking Boot
product_meta.description:
Your style is understated but rugged and technical. Classic trails with a storied history draw you to discover new places. Authentic ltr gtx® women's delivers a lightweight, comfortable, feel and classic leather style that looks great and lasts for years.

Salomon was born in 1947 in the heart of the French Alps and the birthplace of modern alpinism. Driven by a passion for skiing and design innovation, Francois Salomon and his son George designed and perfected much of the first modern ski equipment. During the following 60 years, Salomon's commitment to innovative design and passion for mountain sports created a vast range of revolutionary new concepts in boots, skis and apparel and brought innovative solutions to footwear, apparel and equipment for hiking, adventure racing, mountaineering and trail running. Through performance-driven design, Salomon enhances mountain sports by converting new ideas into action and expanding the limits of possibility.
feature_bullets: WATERPROOF BACKPACKING BOOT: This classic leather backpacking boot is lightweight with a deep, aggressive lug pattern for maximum traction on mixed terrain, & waterproof GORE-TEX for weather protection.
DISCOVER NEW PLACES: This rugged, technical backpacking boot offers motion control, energy management & push-through protection with understated leather style that looks great & lasts for years.

ADVENTURE AWAITS: Whether you love a local day hike or hitting the trails for a multi-day adventure, Salomon makes innovative hiking & backpacking shoes & boots for men & women to help you go the distance.
TIME TO PLAY: Whether you are into trail running, hiking, backpacking, or mountaineering, Salomon has shoes & gear for kids, men & women to help you conquer a new distance, personal record, or event!
SINCE 1947 Salomon has used our passion for outdoor sports & innovation to create progressive gear. Our road & trail running shoes, hiking sneakers, boots, & water shoes help make any path your own.
